description: In a jungle river, three figures in a dugout canoe paddle along, with the lead figure holding a spear aloft on which three hats are impaled. They paddle past two figures hiding in bushes along the riverbank, one of whom exclaims in alarm. The scene presents a surreal and absurd role reversal where hats are treated as trophies hunted by a fearsome group in a remote environment.
caption: "Hathunters!"
